message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'll find very useful. I'm offering it to you for $175. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $175 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest but $120 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, though. How about $140? It's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $140 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you. How about $135?  It's a fair price considering the value of this product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I'm really trying to be fair here. $125 is getting closer to what I need.  I can't go any lower than $130. If you're serious about buying the product, this is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can only go up to $125, and that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at that price?
